name: New Dawn VR
description:
DESCRIPTION

The Sun is setting on Mankind's Last Stronghold.Within these walls sits cuddled next to a fire,the daughter of prophesy,destined to bring in a new dawn for humanity.But now the night is dark and holds ungodly terrors just waiting to breach these walls and devour every last human.Now the fate of Man rests in the enchanted hands of the last wizard.You must command the four elements of nature and bend them to your will to defend all that you hold dear.Fire,Earth,Wind and Water shall heed your call and smite all who stand against you.Can you hold out against the creatures of the dark until the last city witnesses a New Dawn.

GAME MECHANICS

New Dawn is a Survival based,First Person Virtual Reality game wherein the player assumes control of an elemental wizard and defend the castle walls against freaks of nature.The whole game revolves around one button input.Click on one of the four elements to cast its power as a spell.Multiple elements can be combined to create an even greater spell with different effects of devastation.
